extendedInfo.description: Breaking News is The Atlanta Journal-Constitutionâs mobile app for ajc.comâs breaking news and most popular stories, including sports and local entertainment updates. This app has been recently updated for iPhoneÂ®, iPod TouchÂ® and Androidâ¢. Our streamlined news app helps you stay connected with local headlines wherever you are. Features include: â¢ Receive breaking news throughout the day â¢ Access top stories and photo galleries â¢ Easy to share stories via Twitter or Facebook â¢ Free to download and install

reviews.title: Wasn\'t thrilled with prior app but it blows the doors of the new one.
reviews.comment: Need link to braves uga etc... not local sports only.  Still no blog access.  Clunky.  Hate it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Major Fail
reviews.comment: After multiple attempts app will no longer open. Will get my news elsewhere.
reviews.author: Nianya Cambridge

reviews.title: Just an awful mess
reviews.comment: With the recent update I cant even use this app anymore, just can\'t stomach it. Just stop with your attempts with tech, ajc, your people suck at it
reviews.author: Jimmy Hilley

reviews.title: Horrible update
reviews.comment: The old app was a little buggy, but the format was so much better!  This layout is ugly and takes too many clicks to navigate.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Natalie Walker

reviews.title: 4 thumbs down
reviews.comment: Was a pretty nice app before they totally changed it . So much better before . I can\'t even get it to open now . Please bring back the old ajc app .
reviews.author: Adam Anderson

reviews.title: Bring back the old one
reviews.comment: Finding myself using this app a lot less. To bad they didn\'t give us an option,  would have stayed with the old one.
reviews.author: Tom Sizemore

reviews.title: I like it so far.
reviews.comment: The menu and st up of the front page is nice.  I am able to enlarge the letters for better read.  Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: full of fail.
reviews.comment: Read the reviews AJC.  Hire a new developer and get rid of this hideious app... Bring back the old one for now. ASAP.
reviews.author: Jason M. Erbesfield

reviews.title: Bust
reviews.comment: Was fine but now it won\'t open and crashes every time.
reviews.author: Kita Bean

reviews.title: Crashing all day today
reviews.comment: Old version was better. This app is terrible. Been crashing today when launched for no apparent reason.
reviews.author: Brad Gorka

reviews.title: Not good, find another app
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work (after the most recent \"update\"?) and was pretty limited in terms of content and interface/usability before. Time to get the news elsewhere I guess.
reviews.author: Chris Dudley

reviews.title: It doesn\'t open any longer!
reviews.comment: It crashes when trying to open every time. Have you seen your user numbers drop??
reviews.author: Cisco Vila

reviews.title: Fail...
reviews.comment: They should have given us a choice. I would have stayed with the old one. I don\'t care for this one at all and find that I use it less.
reviews.author: Mark Nelms

reviews.title: Always bad, getting worse
reviews.comment: This app has always been terrible, as was its predecessor, but now it won\'t load at all even after a fresh install. Wish I didn\'t want it for local sports.
reviews.author: Bryan Berry

reviews.title: Bad to worse
reviews.comment: This always clunky app won\'t even open now. Can\'t say that I miss it, as its owner\'s political bias and agenda has become all too obvious. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Barbara J. Hall

reviews.title: NO LONGER OPENS/WORKS
reviews.comment: This App is the apparent dying gasp of a once prosperous, if not good, media empire -- Cox Media -- that had rather stand by its political agenda than to develop and deliver the infrastructure to serve its clients and prospects in all political/demographic  segments. I am now playing taps for Cox, the AJC, and WSB!
reviews.author: bill arnold

reviews.title: AJC FAIL
reviews.comment: App won\'t open, sports all lumped together... The old app was better. Skip this one.
reviews.author: Kacey Human

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Will not even open. Garbage!
reviews.author: Abrem Ayana

reviews.title: Crashes.
reviews.comment: This app crashes and for sone reason the icon keeps disappearing feom the folder I had it in. Please produce a better release of this app. You need some focus on quality control.
reviews.author: Jeff S

reviews.title: Hate it
reviews.comment: Slow bulky and has less information. Weather and traffic ok.
reviews.author: Kathy Dunn
